JobFullDesc: About the Role The Marketplace and Delivery Partner team tackles some of ANZ’s most sophisticated problems, on behalf of all ANZ cities. These problems often involve analysis with large data sets, tough strategic decisions and close collaboration with many different partners, and the solutions can have groundbreaking impact. For a tenacious truth seeker, with exceptional attention to detail and a desire to manage multipart projects at a national scale, this is the team for you.What You'll Do:Drive analysis on meaningful strategic decisions and advise business initiatives by understanding the key levers to improve the delivery experience, as well as our fundamental economicsMeasure the impact of the strategies that you execute in order to drive continuous improvement across the businessLead cross-functional teams that consist of other operations teams, product, sales, marketing, finance, etc. to ensure plans address broader strategic initiativesCommunicate to senior regional ops leaders/ GMs on projects/priorities; able to organize and lead effective meetings, collect and provide meaningful feedback & communicate priorities and goals effectivelyTake ownership of new programs, processes, or pilotsWhat You'll Need:4+ years of relevant experienceBachelor or advanced degree in Maths, Computer Science, Business, Engineering, Science, Econometrics, or equivalentProven data analytics skills:SQL - able to build advanced tables & queries from scratch or strong willingness to learnExperience with statistics, Python and/or R highly regardedAdvanced in Excel / Google SheetsAbility to map out processes and automate theseExperience leveraging cross-functional stakeholders in order to manage and execute high-impact projectsStrong verbal and written communication skillsAbility to thrive in a fast-paced and ambiguous environment
